abstract: Tricom Equities was fined $1.35 million by the Australian Securities Exchange, a record, for “blatant and unmistakable” manipulation of the stock market, and failing to meet payment deadlines.
snippet: Tricom Equities was fined $1.35 million by the Australian Securities Exchange, a record, for “blatant and unmistakable” manipulation of the stock market, and failing to meet payment deadlines.
lead_paragraph: Tricom Equities was fined $1.35 million by the Australian Securities Exchange, a record, for “blatant and unmistakable” manipulation of the stock market, and failing to meet payment deadlines, the exchange said Friday, Dow Jones NewsWire reported.

headline.main: Australian Brokerage Fined for Market Manipulation
